header.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire

questionUpload.questionUploadText1: Please upload a JSON file for the questions. The file should be in the following format:
questionUpload.questionUploadText2: The file should contain an array of objects, where each object represents a question.
questionUpload.questionUploadText3: The array must have 15 questions, each with a unique id.

questionCreation.instructions: Please create 15 questions and mark the correct answer with the checkbox. You can also drag the questions to move them around
questionCreation.question: Question
questionCreation.confirmationClearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all questions?
questionCreation.confirmationClearQuestion: Are your sure you want to clear this question?

about.text1: This is a quiz app created with React and Framer Motion. It is based on the popular TV show
about.text2: The questions are stored in a Redux state and are displayed one at a time. The player can choose from four possible answers and must answer each question before moving on to the next one.
about.text3: The player can also use four lifelines to help them answer the questions. These lifelines include:
about.fiftyFiftyText: Removes two incorrect answers, leaving the correct answer and one incorrect answer
about.phoneAFriendText: Calls a friend to ask for help with the question
about.askTheAudienceText: Polls the audience to see what they think the correct answer is
about.askTheHostText: Asks the host for help with the question
about.text4: The app keeps track of the player's score and displays it at the end of the game. Players can choose to play again and try to beat their previous score.
about.text5: It is a fun and challenging game that tests the player's knowledge in a variety of categories.
about.enjoyGame: Enjoy the game and test your knowledge!
